statements.statement: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.MAYTE) as ROWNUMBER, a.*, CASE WHEN A.GIOITINH = 1 THEN 'Nam' WHEN A.GIOITINH = 2 THEN 'Ná»¯' END as TENGIOITINH from TT_BENHNHAN A where ACTIVE = '1') lst where lst.ROWNUMBER between $FROMROW$ and $TOROW$
select count(*) as TOTALROWS from TT_BENHNHAN A where A.ACTIVE = '1'
select * from TT_BENHNHAN where MAYTE = '$MAYTE$' order by BENHNHAN_ID
select * from TT_BENHNHAN where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' order by BENHNHAN_ID
select * from TT_BENHNHAN order by BENHNHAN_ID

select B.*, NVL2(B.NGAYSINH, to_char(B.NGAYSINH, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), B.NAMSINH) as NGAYTHANGNAMSINH
,T.TIEPNHAN_ID AS TIEPNHAN_ID_L, T.SOBHYT AS SOTHE_L, T.BHYTTUNGAY AS NGAYHIEULUC_L, T.BHYTDENNGAY AS NGAYHETHIEULUC_L, T.KHUVUCSONG_ID AS KHUVUCSONG_ID_L , T.NGAYMIENDONGCHITRA AS NGAYMIENDONGCHITRA_L, T.BHYTTREN5NAM AS TREN5NAM_L, T.TRAITUYEN AS TRAITUYEN_L
from TT_BENHNHAN B
left join TT_TIEPNHAN T ON T.TIEPNHAN_ID = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT TIEPNHAN_ID FROM TT_TIEPNHAN WHERE BENHNHAN_ID = B.BENHNHAN_ID ORDER BY THOIGIANTIEPNHAN DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1)
B.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
B.MAYTE = '$MAYTE$'
B.TENBENHNHAN = '$TENBENHNHAN$'
B.GIOITINH = '$GIOITINH$'
B.NGAYSINH = '$NGAYSINH$'
B.NAMSINH = '$NAMSINH$'
B.SODIENTHOAI = '$SODIENTHOAI$'
order by B.BENHNHAN_ID

select distinct TT_BENHNHAN.*, NVL2(TT_BENHNHAN.NGAYSINH, TO_CHAR(TT_BENHNHAN.NGAYSINH,'DD/MM/YYYY'), TT_BENHNHAN.NAMSINH) AS NGAYNAMSINH from TT_BENHNHAN left join TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT on TT_BENHNHAN.BENHNHAN_ID = TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT.BENHNHAN_ID
TT_BENHNHAN.MAYTE ='$MAYTE$'
TT_BENHNHAN.TENBENHNHAN = '$TENBENHNHAN$'
TT_BENHNHAN.HO = '$HO$'
TT_BENHNHAN.TEN = '$TEN$'
TT_BENHNHAN.NAMSINH = '$NAMSINH$'
TRUNC(TT_BENHNHAN.NGAYSINH) = TRUNC(TO_DATE('$NGAYSINH$','DD/MM/YYYY'))
TT_BENHNHAN.GIOITINH = '$GIOITINH$'
TT_BENHNHAN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT.SOTHE = '$SOTHE$'
select TIENSUBENH, TIENSUDIUNG from TT_BENHNHAN where TT_BENHNHAN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
select * from TT_BENHNHAN where MAYTE = '$MABENHNHAN$'
select * from TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT where TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'

select * from TT_BENHNHAN
TT_BENHNHAN.MAYTE = '$MAYTE$'
TT_BENHNHAN.HO = '$HO$'
TT_BENHNHAN.TEN = '$TEN$'
TT_BENHNHAN.NGAYSINH = '$NGAYSINH$'
TT_BENHNHAN.GIOITINH = '$GIOITINH$'

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.MAYTE) as ROWNUMBER, A.*, CASE WHEN A.GIOITINH = 1 THEN 'Nam' WHEN A.GIOITINH = 2 THEN 'Ná»¯' END as TENGIOITINH from TT_BENHNHAN A where ACTIVE = '1' and MAYTE = '$MAYTE$'
statements.update:
update TT_BENHNHAN set MAYTE = #MAYTE#
SOVAOVIEN = #SOVAOVIEN#
TENBENHNHAN = #TENBENHNHAN#
HO = #HO#
TEN = #TEN#
GIOITINH = #GIOITINH#
NGAYSINH = #NGAYSINH#
NAMSINH = #NAMSINH#
SONHA = #SONHA#
DIACHI = #DIACHI#
SODIENTHOAI = #SODIENTHOAI#
XAPHUONG_ID = #XAPHUONG_ID#
QUANHUYEN_ID = #QUANHUYEN_ID#
TINHTHANH_ID = #TINHTHANH_ID#
DANTOC_ID = #DANTOC_ID#
QUOCTICH_ID = #QUOCTICH_ID#
SOLUUTRUNOITRU = #SOLUUTRUNOITRU#
SOLUUTRUNGOAITRU = #SOLUUTRUNGOAITRU#
NGHENGHIEP_ID = #NGHENGHIEP_ID#
CMND = #CMND#
HOCHIEU = #HOCHIEU#
VIETKIEU = #VIETKIEU#
NGUOINUOCNGOAI = #NGUOINUOCNGOAI#
DIACHITHUONGTRU = #DIACHITHUONGTRU#
DIACHILIENLAC = #DIACHILIENLAC#
DIACHICOQUAN = #DIACHICOQUAN#
EMAIL = #EMAIL#
NHOMMAU_ID = #NHOMMAU_ID#
YEUTORH_ID = #YEUTORH_ID#
TIENSUDIUNG = #TIENSUDIUNG#
TIENSUBENH = #TIENSUBENH#
TIENSUHUTTHUOCLA = #TIENSUHUTTHUOCLA#
TUVONG = #TUVONG#
NGAYTUVONG = #NGAYTUVONG#
THOIGIANTUVONG = #THOIGIANTUVONG#
NGUYENNHANTUVONG_ID = #NGUYENNHANTUVONG_ID#
NGUOIGHINHANTUVONG_ID = #NGUOIGHINHANTUVONG_ID#
THOIGIANGHINHANTUVONG = #THOIGIANGHINHANTUVONG#
NHANVIEN_ID = #NHANVIEN_ID#
DONVICONGTAC_ID = #DONVICONGTAC_ID#
DIENTHOAIBAN = #DIENTHOAIBAN#
TINHTRANGHONNHAN_ID = #TINHTRANGHONNHAN_ID#
NGUOILIENHE_ID = #NGUOILIENHE_ID#
MOIQUANHE_ID = #MOIQUANHE_ID#
NGUOILIENHE = #NGUOILIENHE#
THONGTIN_NLH = #THONGTIN_NLH#
GHICHU = #GHICHU#
PID = #PID#
BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
ACTIVE = #ACTIVE#
NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#
where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'

update TT_BENHNHAN set MAYTE = #MAYTE#
SOVAOVIEN = #SOVAOVIEN#
TENBENHNHAN = #TENBENHNHAN#
HO = #HO#
TEN = #TEN#
GIOITINH = #GIOITINH#
NGAYSINH = #NGAYSINH#
NGAYGIOSINH = #NGAYGIOSINH#
NAMSINH = #NAMSINH#
SODIENTHOAI = #SODIENTHOAI#
SONHA = #SONHA#
DIACHI = #DIACHI#
DIACHITHUONGTRU = #DIACHITHUONGTRU#
DIACHILIENLAC = #DIACHILIENLAC#
DIACHICOQUAN = #DIACHICOQUAN#
XAPHUONG_ID = #XAPHUONG_ID#
SOLUUTRUNOITRU = #SOLUUTRUNOITRU#
SOLUUTRUNGOAITRU = #SOLUUTRUNGOAITRU#
NGHENGHIEP_ID = #NGHENGHIEP_ID#
QUOCTICH_ID = #QUOCTICH_ID#
DANTOC_ID = #DANTOC_ID#
VIETKIEU = #VIETKIEU#
NGUOINUOCNGOAI = #NGUOINUOCNGOAI#
CMND = #CMND#
HOCHIEU = #HOCHIEU#
EMAIL = #EMAIL#
HINHANH_DAIDIEN = #HINHANH_DAIDIEN#
NHOMMAU_ID = #NHOMMAU_ID#
YEUTORH_ID = #YEUTORH_ID#
TIENSUDIUNG = #TIENSUDIUNG#
TIENSUBENH = #TIENSUBENH#
TIENSUHUTTHUOCLA = #TIENSUHUTTHUOCLA#
TUVONG = #TUVONG#
NGAYTUVONG = #NGAYTUVONG#
THOIGIANTUVONG = #THOIGIANTUVONG#
NGUYENNHANTUVONG_ID = #NGUYENNHANTUVONG_ID#
NGUOIGHINHANTUVONG_ID = #NGUOIGHINHANTUVONG_ID#
THOIGIANGHINHANTUVONG = #THOIGIANGHINHANTUVONG#
NHANVIEN_ID = #NHANVIEN_ID#
DONVICONGTAC_ID = #DONVICONGTAC_ID#
DIENTHOAIBAN = #DIENTHOAIBAN#
TINHTRANGHONNHAN_ID = #TINHTRANGHONNHAN_ID#
NGUOILIENHE_ID = #NGUOILIENHE_ID#
NGUOILIENHE = #NGUOILIENHE#
THONGTIN_NLH = #THONGTIN_NLH#
MOIQUANHE_ID = #MOIQUANHE_ID#
GHICHU = #GHICHU#
ACTIVE = #ACTIVE#
BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#
where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
statements.statement: declare vrCount int := 0; vrId int := 0; begin select count(*) into vrCount from TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT where SOTHE = '$SOTHE$' and BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and ROWNUM = 1; if (vrCount = 0) then select TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT_S.nextval into vrId from dual; insert into TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT ( BENHNHAN_BHYT_ID , BENHNHAN_ID , LOAIBHYT , SOTHE , NGAYCAP , NGAYHIEULUC , NGAYHETHIEULUC , TINHTHANH_CAPTHE_ID , BENHVIEN_ID , BENHVIEN_KCB_ID , TREN3NAM , TREN5NAM , TREN6THANG , NGAYMIENDONGCHITRA , TAMNGUNG , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , KHUVUCSONG_ID ) values ( vrId , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #LOAIBHYT# , #SOTHE# , #NGAYCAP# , #NGAYHIEULUC# , #NGAYHETHIEULUC# , #TINHTHANH_CAPTHE_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #BENHVIEN_KCB_ID# , #TREN3NAM# , #TREN5NAM# , #TREN6THANG# , #NGAYMIENDONGCHITRA# , #TAMNGUNG# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #KHUVUCSONG_ID# ); else update TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT set LOAIBHYT = #LOAIBHYT# , SOTHE = #SOTHE# , NGAYCAP = #NGAYCAP# , NGAYHIEULUC = #NGAYHIEULUC# , NGAYHETHIEULUC = #NGAYHETHIEULUC# , TINHTHANH_CAPTHE_ID = #TINHTHANH_CAPTHE_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , BENHVIEN_KCB_ID = #BENHVIEN_KCB_ID# , TREN3NAM = #TREN3NAM# , TREN5NAM = #TREN5NAM# , TREN6THANG = #TREN6THANG# , NGAYMIENDONGCHITRA = #NGAYMIENDONGCHITRA# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , KHUVUCSONG_ID = #KHUVUCSONG_ID# where SOTHE = '$SOTHE$' and BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'; end if; end;
statements.update: update TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT set BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , LOAIBHYT = #LOAIBHYT# , SOTHE = #SOTHE# , NGAYCAP = #NGAYCAP# , NGAYHIEULUC = #NGAYHIEULUC# , NGAYHETHIEULUC = #NGAYHETHIEULUC# , TINHTHANH_CAPTHE_ID = #TINHTHANH_CAPTHE_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , BENHVIEN_KCB_ID = #BENHVIEN_KCB_ID# , TREN3NAM = #TREN3NAM# , TREN5NAM = #TREN5NAM# , TREN6THANG = #TREN6THANG# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , KHUVUCSONG_ID = #KHUVUCSONG_ID# where BENHNHAN_BHYT_ID = '$BENHNHAN_BHYT_ID$'
update TT_BENHNHAN set TIENSUBENH = #TIENSUBENH# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
statements.statement:
SELECT TT_BENHNHAN.BENHNHAN_ID ,MAYTE ,TENBENHNHAN ,HO ,TEN ,GIOITINH ,NGAYSINH ,NAMSINH ,DIACHI ,CMND || '/ '|| HOCHIEU as CMND ,SOTHE FROM TT_BENHNHAN left join TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT on TT_BENHNHAN.BENHNHAN_ID = TT_BENHNHAN_BHYT.BENHNHAN_ID
TT_BENHNHAN.MAYTE like '%$MAYTE$%'
TT_BENHNHAN.HO like '%$HO$%'
TT_BENHNHAN.TEN like '%$TEN$%'
TT_BENHNHAN_EXT.CMND like '%$CMND$%'
TT_BENHNHAN_EXT.HOCHIEU like '%$HOCHIEU$%'
TT_BENHNHAN.GIOITINH like '$GIOITINH$'
Order by TT_BENHNHAN.BENHNHAN_ID
select * from TT_BENHNHAN where MAYTE = '$MAYTE$'
statements.insert:
select TT_BENHNHAN_NGUOILIENHE_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_BENHNHAN_NGUOILIENHE ( NGUOILIENHE_ID ,NGUOILIENHE_BENHNHAN_ID ,MANGUOIBENH ,TENNGUOILIENHE ,HO ,TEN ,QUANHE_ID ,GIOITINH ,NGAYSINH ,CMND ,SODIENTHOAI ,DIACHI ,THONGTINLIENHE ,BENHNHAN_ID ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ,BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# ,#NGUOILIENHE_BENHNHAN_ID# ,#MANGUOIBENH# ,#TENNGUOILIENHE# ,#HO# ,#TEN# ,#QUANHE_ID# ,#GIOITINH# ,#NGAYSINH# ,#CMND# ,#SODIENTHOAI# ,#DIACHI# ,#THONGTINLIENHE# ,#BENHNHAN_ID# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_BENHNHAN_NGUOILIENHE set NGUOILIENHE_BENHNHAN_ID = #NGUOILIENHE_BENHNHAN_ID# , MANGUOIBENH = #MANGUOIBENH# , TENNGUOILIENHE = #TENNGUOILIENHE# , HO = #HO# , TEN = #TEN# , QUANHE_ID = #QUANHE_ID# , GIOITINH = #GIOITINH# , NGAYSINH = #NGAYSINH# , CMND = #CMND# , SODIENTHOAI = #SODIENTHOAI# , DIACHI = #DIACHI# , THONGTINLIENHE = #THONGTINLIENHE# , BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where NGUOILIENHE_ID = '$NGUOILIENHE_ID$'
statements.statement: SELECT BNN.*, D.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUANHE FROM TT_BENHNHAN BN INNER JOIN TT_BENHNHAN_NGUOILIENHE BNN ON BNN.BENHNHAN_ID = BN.BENHNHAN_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D ON D.DICTIONARY_ID = BNN.QUANHE_ID AND D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuanHeGiaDinh' WHERE BN.MAYTE = '$MAYTE$' AND BN.ACTIVE = '1' AND BN.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
delete from TT_BENHNHAN_NGUOILIENHE where NGUOILIENHE_ID = '$NGUOILIENHE_ID$'

select TIEPNHAN_ID AS ID from TT_TIEPNHAN where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' UNION ALL select DANGKY_ID AS ID from TT_CSKH_GOI_DANGKY where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' UNION ALL select THANHVIEN_ID AS ID from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'

SELECT A.SOTIEPNHAN, A.TIEPNHAN_ID, B.BENHAN_ID, B.SOBENHAN from TT_TIEPNHAN A left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN B on A.TIEPNHAN_ID = B.TIEPNHAN_ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and A.TRANGTHAI in ('DATIEPNHAN','CAPCUU','NOITRU')

SELECT A.SOTIEPNHAN, A.TIEPNHAN_ID, C.DICHVU_ID, C.DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_TIEPNHAN A left join (select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$') C on C.TIEPNHAN_ID = A.TIEPNHAN_ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and A.TRANGTHAI in ('DATIEPNHAN','CAPCUU','NOITRU')

SELECT B.KHAMBENH_ID as KHAMBENH_TOATHUOC_ID, 'NOITRU' as LOAITOA from TT_TIEPNHAN A left join TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC B on A.TIEPNHAN_ID = B.TIEPNHAN_ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and A.TRANGTHAI in ('DATIEPNHAN','CAPCUU','NOITRU')

SELECT B.KHAMBENH_TOATHUOC_ID, B.LOAITOATHUOC as LOAITOA from TT_TIEPNHAN A left join TT_NGOAITRU_KHAMBENH C on C.TIEPNHAN_ID = A.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TT_NGOAITRU_KHAMBENH_TOATHUOC B on C.KHAMBENH_ID = B.KHAMBENH_ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and A.TRANGTHAI in ('DATIEPNHAN','CAPCUU','NOITRU')

SELECT D1.MADONVI AS MAXAPHUONG, D2.MADONVI AS MAQUANHUYEN, D3.MADONVI AS MATINHTHANH FROM TM_DONVIHANHCHINH D1 LEFT JOIN TM_DONVIHANHCHINH D2 ON D2.DONVIHANHCHINH_ID = D1.CAPTREN_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DONVIHANHCHINH D3 ON D3.DONVIHANHCHINH_ID = D2.CAPTREN_ID WHERE D1.MADONVI = '$XAPHUONG_ID$'
